programme.title: Against the Odds
programme.sub-title: Team OG's rise from esports underdogs to victors
programme.desc: Rising from rock bottom and defying the odds to shoot for gaming's biggest prize, this is how Team OG's unconventional esports approach led them to go for Dota 2 glory at The International competition.
programme.series-desc: Team OG defied the odds – witness their esports journey to Dota 2 glory at TI8.

programme.title: Valley Uprising
programme.desc: Valley Uprising is the riveting, unforgettable tale of the bold rock climbing tradition in Yosemite National Park: half a century of struggle against the laws of gravity -- and the laws of the land.
programme.series-desc: Join Alex Honnold for an inside look into how climbers carved out a counterculture lifestyle in Yosemite.

programme.title: Yamnuska: The Ragged Edge
programme.sub-title: Explore the legacy of Canada's climbing icon, Mount Yamnuska
programme.desc: Follow modern-day adventurers Vikki Weldon and Quentin Roberts as they embark on a climbing journey through time, celebrating the rich history of one of Canada’s most iconic cliffs, Mount Yamnuska.
programme.series-desc: Vikki Weldon and Quentin Roberts explore the enduring legacy of rock climbing on Canada's Mount Yamnuska.

programme.title: The Next Centimeter
programme.sub-title: Pole vaulter Armand ‘Mondo’ Duplantis chases new records
programme.desc: By 24, he's already become an eight-time record breaker. Sheer grit has made Armand ‘Mondo’ Duplantis one of the century’s most extraordinary athletes – but can he continue to raise the bar one centimetre at a time?
programme.series-desc: Discover what it takes for pole vaulter Armand ‘Mondo’ Duplantis to raise the bar – one centimetre at a time.

programme.title: Au Revoir
programme.desc: A competitive family legacy, a brotherly rivalry that fuelled his rise, and a last act on the water. Au Revoir is the wakeboarding ride of a lifetime as Raph Derome retires from the competitive sport.
programme.series-desc: The story of wake-boarding champion Raph Derome as he retires from riding in front of crowds and cameras.

programme.title: Sandro Dias redefines the limits of skateboarding
programme.desc: Sandro Dias brings to life the urban legend of skating down a building shaped like a quarter pipe, and redefines the limits of skateboarding. Watch as he sets two new world records.
programme.series-desc: Skateboarder Sandro Dias sets two world records descending from a 22-storey building in Porto Alegre, Brazil.

programme.title: Asa Vermette's Ascent
programme.sub-title: A rookie’s breakout year in downhill MTB
programme.desc: One of mountain biking’s most exciting young riders, Asa Vermette, has secured a Junior world title. Follow his journey as he faces downhill’s toughest race in his debut Red Bull Hardline season.
programme.series-desc: Follow Asa Vermette – one of mountain biking’s most exciting young riders – on his debut at Red Bull Hardline.

programme.title: For Reals
programme.sub-title: From F1 desert racing to a skatepark in the sky
programme.desc: Wakeskating off a Dubai skyscraper. F1 drivers racing on Floridan waters and in the Nevada desert. Riding a skatepark attached to a hot air balloon. It's all in a day's work for Red Bull athletes!
programme.series-desc: Red Bull athletes do it all, from riding a skatepark under a hot air balloon to F1 drivers racing on water.

programme.series-desc: Red Bull athletes do it all, from speed skating in Norway to BASE jumping from treacherous Mount Everest.

programme.series-desc: Red Bull athletes do it all, from skiing down the steepest run at night to slacklining during an eclipse.

programme.desc: Freethrow master vs robot. High-flying action from wingsuits to parachutes. Wakeboarding in Chile. Barrel racing with a dirtbike. It's all in a day's work for Red Bull athletes!
programme.series-desc: Red Bull athletes do it all, from barrel racing with a dirtbike to the first quad cork ever landed.

programme.title: For Reals

programme.series-desc: Red Bull athletes do it all, from skydiving with a motocross bike to riding rally cars on frozen lakes.

programme.title: For Reals
programme.sub-title: From BASE jumping a cave to a flying mega swing

programme.series-desc: Red Bull athletes do it all, from slacklining the distance of two soccer fields to BASE jumping into a cave.

programme.sub-title: From skydiving with skis to flying into a volcano

programme.title: Risking it All
programme.desc: Out of work gamekeepers in Madagascar are turning to poaching the endangered Rosewood tree, risking arrest, injury and even death.
programme.series-desc:
Escaping the pressures of modern society proves to be an unforgettable and life-changing adventure as three families set out to live off the land. These families not only unplug their smartphones and tablets, but they also give up electricity and running water for a life off the grid in a drastic last resort to reconnect with each other. From attempting to save their marriage to dealing with family illness to regaining control of their relationships, each family has a different reason for embarking on the journey of a lifetime. The three families pack up their homes, say their good-byes to loved ones, and prepare for the challenges that come with trading in the luxuries of modern-day society for a self-sufficient life.
In a world where we have more forms of connection than ever before we tend to lose ourselves in the constant connectivity. “Risking It All” captures something many modern day families can relate to -- a strive and struggle to revisit building relationships and getting back to basics.

programme.title: The Stream
programme.desc: With countries struggling to bring the chikungunya virus under control, is the world prepared for another health emergency?
programme.series-desc:
The Stream is a daily television programme on Al Jazeera English. It is branded as a “Web community With a Global TV show”. On television and online The Stream taps into the extraordinary potential of social media to disseminate news. The Stream is an aggregator of online sources and discussion, seeking out unheard voices, new perspectives from people on the ground and untold angles related to the most compelling stories of the day.
Previously, the show was hosted by Derrick Ashong and Imran Garda. Lisa Fletcher replaced them as the new presenter. On June 25, 2012, the Stream was relaunched with a new studio and opening graphics. Femi Oke replaced Fletcher when Fletcher was picked to host a version of The Stream on Al Jazeera America.

programme.title: The Stream
programme.desc: Powered by social media, The Stream brings fresh perspectives and new voices, beyond the headlines.
programme.series-desc:
The Stream is a daily television programme on Al Jazeera English. It is branded as a “Web community With a Global TV show”. On television and online The Stream taps into the extraordinary potential of social media to disseminate news. The Stream is an aggregator of online sources and discussion, seeking out unheard voices, new perspectives from people on the ground and untold angles related to the most compelling stories of the day.
Previously, the show was hosted by Derrick Ashong and Imran Garda. Lisa Fletcher replaced them as the new presenter. On June 25, 2012, the Stream was relaunched with a new studio and opening graphics. Femi Oke replaced Fletcher when Fletcher was picked to host a version of The Stream on Al Jazeera America.

How will those two mothers end their fierce revenge?

programme.title: Risking it All
programme.desc: Faced with high unemployment rates and a collapsing economy, Venezuelans find different ways of smuggling fuel to Colombia while evading the Venezuelan military
programme.series-desc:
Escaping the pressures of modern society proves to be an unforgettable and life-changing adventure as three families set out to live off the land. These families not only unplug their smartphones and tablets, but they also give up electricity and running water for a life off the grid in a drastic last resort to reconnect with each other. From attempting to save their marriage to dealing with family illness to regaining control of their relationships, each family has a different reason for embarking on the journey of a lifetime. The three families pack up their homes, say their good-byes to loved ones, and prepare for the challenges that come with trading in the luxuries of modern-day society for a self-sufficient life.
In a world where we have more forms of connection than ever before we tend to lose ourselves in the constant connectivity. “Risking It All” captures something many modern day families can relate to -- a strive and struggle to revisit building relationships and getting back to basics.

programme.series-desc: Yu Kyung is a successful woman who is proficient enough to become an executive director of Chunha Group when she started as a secretary. How will those two mothers end their fierce revenge?

programme.title: Risking it All
programme.desc: Faced with high unemployment rates and a collapsing economy, Venezuelans find different ways of smuggling fuel to Colombia while evading the Venezuelan military
programme.series-desc:
Escaping the pressures of modern society proves to be an unforgettable and life-changing adventure as three families set out to live off the land. These families not only unplug their smartphones and tablets, but they also give up electricity and running water for a life off the grid in a drastic last resort to reconnect with each other. From attempting to save their marriage to dealing with family illness to regaining control of their relationships, each family has a different reason for embarking on the journey of a lifetime. The three families pack up their homes, say their good-byes to loved ones, and prepare for the challenges that come with trading in the luxuries of modern-day society for a self-sufficient life.
In a world where we have more forms of connection than ever before we tend to lose ourselves in the constant connectivity. “Risking It All” captures something many modern day families can relate to -- a strive and struggle to revisit building relationships and getting back to basics.

programme.title: The Stream
programme.desc: Powered by social media, The Stream brings fresh perspectives and new voices, beyond the headlines.
programme.series-desc:
The Stream is a daily television programme on Al Jazeera English. It is branded as a “Web community With a Global TV show”. On television and online The Stream taps into the extraordinary potential of social media to disseminate news. The Stream is an aggregator of online sources and discussion, seeking out unheard voices, new perspectives from people on the ground and untold angles related to the most compelling stories of the day.
Previously, the show was hosted by Derrick Ashong and Imran Garda. Lisa Fletcher replaced them as the new presenter. On June 25, 2012, the Stream was relaunched with a new studio and opening graphics. Femi Oke replaced Fletcher when Fletcher was picked to host a version of The Stream on Al Jazeera America.

programme.title: Risking it All
programme.desc: Faced with high unemployment rates and a collapsing economy, Venezuelans find different ways of smuggling fuel to Colombia while evading the Venezuelan military
programme.series-desc:
Escaping the pressures of modern society proves to be an unforgettable and life-changing adventure as three families set out to live off the land. These families not only unplug their smartphones and tablets, but they also give up electricity and running water for a life off the grid in a drastic last resort to reconnect with each other. From attempting to save their marriage to dealing with family illness to regaining control of their relationships, each family has a different reason for embarking on the journey of a lifetime. The three families pack up their homes, say their good-byes to loved ones, and prepare for the challenges that come with trading in the luxuries of modern-day society for a self-sufficient life.
In a world where we have more forms of connection than ever before we tend to lose ourselves in the constant connectivity. “Risking It All” captures something many modern day families can relate to -- a strive and struggle to revisit building relationships and getting back to basics.

programme.title: Risking it All
programme.desc: Faced with high unemployment rates and a collapsing economy, Venezuelans find different ways of smuggling fuel to Colombia while evading the Venezuelan military
programme.series-desc:
Escaping the pressures of modern society proves to be an unforgettable and life-changing adventure as three families set out to live off the land. These families not only unplug their smartphones and tablets, but they also give up electricity and running water for a life off the grid in a drastic last resort to reconnect with each other. From attempting to save their marriage to dealing with family illness to regaining control of their relationships, each family has a different reason for embarking on the journey of a lifetime. The three families pack up their homes, say their good-byes to loved ones, and prepare for the challenges that come with trading in the luxuries of modern-day society for a self-sufficient life.
In a world where we have more forms of connection than ever before we tend to lose ourselves in the constant connectivity. “Risking It All” captures something many modern day families can relate to -- a strive and struggle to revisit building relationships and getting back to basics.

programme.title: The Stream
programme.desc: The Stream is where Al Jazeera's audience becomes a global community.
programme.series-desc:
The Stream is a daily television programme on Al Jazeera English. It is branded as a “Web community With a Global TV show”. On television and online The Stream taps into the extraordinary potential of social media to disseminate news. The Stream is an aggregator of online sources and discussion, seeking out unheard voices, new perspectives from people on the ground and untold angles related to the most compelling stories of the day.
Previously, the show was hosted by Derrick Ashong and Imran Garda. Lisa Fletcher replaced them as the new presenter. On June 25, 2012, the Stream was relaunched with a new studio and opening graphics. Femi Oke replaced Fletcher when Fletcher was picked to host a version of The Stream on Al Jazeera America.
